tool_description: Provides real-time GPS coordinates and location updates for tracked shipments using various positioning technologies.

tracking_numbers.description: List of tracking numbers to monitor

include_speed.description: Whether to include speed and direction data

error_messages: Invalid tracking number: One or more tracking numbers are not recognized. Verify the format and validity.
GPS signal unavailable: Unable to obtain location data for some shipments. This may be due to poor signal coverage.
Update frequency out of range: Frequency must be between 1 and 60 minutes. Adjust the value accordingly.
Too many tracking requests: Maximum 50 tracking numbers allowed per request. Split into smaller batches.
usage: Provide an array of tracking_numbers to monitor. Optionally set update_frequency (1-60 minutes) and enable speed data with include_speed.

tracking_data.description: Array of tracking status strings for each shipment

active_shipments.description: Number of shipments currently being tracked
